instructions and steps i followed to make these socks for me i have a size 8 foot women s australia and typically knit a medium/ large size sock with a cast on of 64 stitches if your foot size is the foot pattern with the one i ve detailed in this pattern adapting the pattern if you have a larger or smaller foot size to me you can apply my stitch pattern for the ankle and foot to any basic sock
